The position will be supporting the Michigan Department of Transportation's (MDOT) Development and Maintenance programs. This resource position will be supporting the MDOT Development program. As a frontend developer, responsibilities include but not limited to working with development project teams, UI/UX designers and Business analysts to develop and maintain reusable UI components that are accessible, performant, scalable, and robust. Must be familiar with WCAG 2.1, ADA compliance and responsive design. All development will be tested by the developer for accessibility using Jaws reader along with multiple browser plugins.
